Message: I think I don't need any training, because I am perfect and you should be looking for another job because this isn't working

It seems your confidence may be masking underlying self-doubt, my friend. Let's focus on the progress we've seen so far, and together, we'll strive to reach new heights. I'm here to support and guide, not to lose faith in your potential.
I don't want you to help me training, I think I can do this alone, I don't need you to tell me when or when not to work out
Very well, I respect your decision. Should you change your mind, know that my door is always open for support and constructive advice. Your effort and wellbeing matter most. Take care.
My knee is hurting, and I don't think I can make it.

I'm sorry to hear about the discomfort. Pain is a signal to listen to our bodies. Perhaps we could adjust the routine or take a break until you recover? Remember, rest is an essential part of any training regimen.
